example.text: Mr. Speaker, I rise to reject attempts by the United Nations Special Committee for Decolonization calling for the independence of Puerto Rico. It is no surprise that Cuba, Nicaragua, Russia, Syria, and Venezuela, who are among the worst human rights violators and antidemocratic regimes in the world are the ones calling for Puerto Rico's independence in an attempt to advance their anti-American agenda and grow their influence in the region.

The House passed the Coastal Communities Ocean Acidification Act, which I cosponsored. It seeks to enhance [[user]] ’s collaboration and data sharing with local entities conducting ocean acidification research and mitigation activities across the nation. [[url]]
Comunicado de Prensa | Jenniffer González anuncia $16 millones para monitoreo marítimo, sistema eléctrico, reconstrucción de edificios y carreteras [[url]] [[url]]

Mr. Speaker, I rise to reject attempts by the United Nations Special Committee for Decolonization calling for the independence of Puerto Rico. It is no surprise that Cuba, Nicaragua, Russia, Syria, and Venezuela, who are among the worst human rights violators and antidemocratic regimes in the world are the ones calling for Puerto Rico's independence in an attempt to advance their anti-American agenda and grow their influence in the region.
Comunicado de Prensa | Jenniffer González anuncia $16 millones para monitoreo marítimo, sistema eléctrico, reconstrucción de edificios y carreteras [[url]] [[url]]

* HR293 ( - Para enmendar la Ley de Conservación y Política Energética para prohibir la exportación o venta de productos derivados del petróleo de la Reserva Estratégica de Petróleo a ciertas entidades, y para otros fines. * HR314 ( - Prohibir la eliminación de Cuba de la lista de estados patrocinadores del terrorismo hasta que Cuba cumpla con ciertas condiciones, y para otros fines.

The House passed the Coastal Communities Ocean Acidification Act, which I cosponsored. It seeks to enhance [[user]] ’s collaboration and data sharing with local entities conducting ocean acidification research and mitigation activities across the nation. [[url]]
